mfa.prompt_authenticator_copy.translation: To enable two-step verification, youâ€™ll need an authenticator app like {authy} or {google}.

mfa.scan_qr_code_body.translation: Open your authenticator app and scan this QR code or enter your setup key.

mfa.enter_totp_body.translation:
Please enter the 6-digit code 
from your authenticator app

mfa.recovery_code_body.translation: This code can be used to log in if you lose access to your authenticator app. Store it someplace safe.

mfa.use_recovery_code_body.translation:
Enter your recovery
code to log in

mfa.max_attempt_warning_msg.translation: Invalid code. ({attempts}) attempts remaining before your account is locked.

mfa.lost_recovery_code_body.translation: For help recovering your account, please contact the {appName} support team.
